name: Vasota Fort (Vyaghragad)
duration: 3–5 hours (one way trek to fort top)
description: Vasota Fort, also known as Vyaghragad (meaning Tiger Fort), is an ancient hill fort located in the dense forests of Koyna Wildlife Sanctuary near Bamnoli village in Satara district. The fort is perched on a hill surrounded by Shivsagar Lake on three sides, making it a captivating destination for nature lovers and adventure seekers. The trek involves a jungle trail, boat ride, and exploration of the fort ruins within a protected wildlife sanctuary.

startingPoint.description: Bamnoli is the main base village to start the Vasota trek. Trekkers often take a boat ride across Shivsagar backwaters to Met Indavli, the start of the forest trek to Vasota Fort. Basic facilities are available here including tent camping options.
